I will give you some context, just answer "read" if you read the following text, don't say anything else.
"""Information from website
Facilities of Hotel Moderne Saint Germain

LOCATION
The Hotel Moderne Saint-Germain offers you a very central base for exploring Paris. Discover a district steeped in history with numerous major landmarks, including the Pantheon, the Luxembourg Gardens and Museum, Saint-Sulpice Church or the old Sorbonne University.

READ MORE
Hotel Le Moderne Saint Germain - Interior
Hotel Le Moderne Saint Germain - Interior
Hotel Le Moderne Saint Germain - Interior
LOUNGE
The Hotel Moderne Saint-Germain offers its guests a pleasant lounge area to catch up with friends, connect to Internet, play table football or simply enjoy a relaxing break.

Hotel Le Moderne Saint Germain - Interior
Hotel Le Moderne Saint Germain - Interior
Hotel Le Moderne Saint Germain - Interior
SERVICES
Our multilingual reception team is available 24/7. In addition to organising taxis or restaurant bookings, they will be delighted to help you with any questions concerning your stay in Paris and help make it as carefree and relaxing as possible. Unfortunately pets are not allowed in the hotel. On the 6th floor the rooms benefit from a private balcony and are exclusively accessible by stairs.

READ MORE
Hotel Le Moderne Saint Germain - Breakfast
Hotel Le Moderne Saint Germain - Interior
Hotel Le Moderne Saint Germain - Interior
BREAKFAST
Our cheerful and fun breakfast room with its modern design welcomes you every morning from 7 to 10.30. Start your day in style with our delicious buffet breakfast complete with a choice of cereals, cheese board, yogurts, a variety of breads and croissants with jam, as well as hot and cold drinks.
"""

Book a table:
Our multilingual reception team is available 24/7 and can assist you in booking a table at a nearby restaurant. Feel free to ask for recommendations or assistance.

Breakfast:
Our buffet breakfast is served every morning from 7 to 10:30 in our breakfast room. It includes a choice of cereals, cheese board, yogurts, a variety of breads and croissants with jam, as well as hot and cold drinks.

Cancellations:
Cancellation and prepayment policies vary according to accommodation type. Please check the conditions that apply to your selected option when making your reservation.

Careers:
For career inquiries, please visit our website or contact us directly.

Casino:
There is no casino at Hotel Moderne Saint Germain.

Check-in:
Check-in is available from 15:00. Guests are required to show photo identification and the credit card used for booking upon check-in.

Check-out:
Check-out is until 12:00.

Children policy:
Children of any age are welcome. Children under 2 years old may stay free of charge in their parents' room and in existing bedding. No extra bed or cot is available.

Closing periods:
For information on closing periods, please contact the hotel directly.

Contacts:
For contact information, please visit our website or refer to the information provided in your booking confirmation.

Covid-19:
We are taking steps to protect the safety of guests and staff. Certain services and amenities may be reduced or unavailable. Wearing a face mask is mandatory in all indoor common areas.

Discounts, Offers and Partnerships:
For information on discounts, offers, and partnerships, please visit our website or contact us directly.

Golf:
There is no golf course at Hotel Moderne Saint Germain.

Kids clubs, Playgrounds, and Entertainment:
We have a games
